documents.document: Meaning achieved!
Today, my desperate quest for meaning in life has brought me to Crystal Palace. #CRYSUN @SunderlandAFC https://t.co/ZaZaf2Lfig
He'll be the judge of that. https://t.co/UerwkOSt1u
It's bin day AND #transferdeadlineday. This won't happen again in our lifetime.
#DrainTheSwamp https://t.co/NHSFjpkPMF
@danthomascomedy Haha yes. It's not just impressive or anything. Genuinely enjoying it. Seems best not to question it as you're going along.
@danthomascomedy Worth it. Me and Chopping are in the 300s. It's an astonishing book. Never read anything like it.
@danthomascomedy That's a belter! How's #DanReadsInfiniteJest going?
@JasonArnopp @RetroGamer_Mag I thought she was going out with Wayne Of The Exploding Fist?
@JasonArnopp @RetroGamer_Mag I loved Space Harriet. How's she doing?
That's why Jill Stein's in the new Adam Sandler movie. https://t.co/BR8FpK7xXb
#Trump45 is the political equivalent of a "100% Unauthorised" boy band calendar
I keep my Linkin Park Crawling CD close and my One Step Closer
Feeling optimistic #WBASUN https://t.co/oyLvD7pApM
@SiHawkins I'm going to West Brom tomorrow. I'll have a word.
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping Just finished Neil Patrick Harris' Choose Your Own Autobiography (which is great) for light relief from IJ
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping Enjoyed it. Got a bit samey in places like all of them. Really liked the epilogue.
@SunderlandAFC Let's hope they mostly attack down their left
I was worried about Moyes' lineup for tonight's #FACup replay, but relieved to see he's only started with 3 right backs #Sunderland
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping We need to start shorthand : IJ p193 U4 c10
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping Just got to Madagascar. Great so far, except the Scottish bit felt like filler. Jump, shoot, jump etc
@MrChrisChopping @danthomascomedy You missed out on what we now just call 'The Scottish Level' so you're doing well
@JasonArnopp I loved the Texas Ticklestick Massacre
@robdelaney Glad to see your large son doing so well. https://t.co/i0BvX1ZD6O
@sophia_salmassi @inkysquiggles eBay, search hamster shirt
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping I played 4 games of top level Scrabble and read zero also
If I'd been at the #Trump press conference, when he said 'germaphobe' I'd have bellowed "URINE IS STERILE!" and stormed out
Gotta catch 'em all... HEGEMON #Trump #TrumpCabinet https://t.co/5D4BMK7tKH
Why is this news? I thought everything in his bathroom was gold #goldenshower #trump
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping They do say 'Hijack' is one of those books you must read before you die
@bechillcomedian Before Countdown audition had the word 'culminate' in my head all day. 1st round of audition the 9 letters made 'culminate'
@MrChrisChopping @danthomascomedy I've stopped at 95 as the nearest chapter break to 100, and am awaiting further instruction
@MrChrisChopping @danthomascomedy The train game story footnote is even longer. Good though.
@MrChrisChopping @danthomascomedy OK, I read the damn footnote. Fair enough, it got more relevant as it went on
@MrChrisChopping @danthomascomedy I read 2 pages of that and skimmed the titles of the rest. It can't be crucial, surely...
@danthomascomedy It'd be quite a thing if he made that up. It feels older than time itself. A classic.
@MrChrisChopping @danthomascomedy was in middle of Murakami/Ozawa on music and Neil Patrick Harris autobiog but they've gone by the wayside
@danthomascomedy Like Infinite Jest, Uncharted series is enjoyable but I find the depth of character and plot bewildering, had to make notes
@danthomascomedy I did 1, 2, 3 so I enjoyed 1 due to lack of context. Got bored halfway thru 3 from fatigue I think, but rallied for ending
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping Let me know when you finish 3 and we'll have a discussion group
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping You've got more children than me
@danthomascomedy @MrChrisChopping Should we all meet up at a certain point then? I'm at page 78. Skipped 5 pages of Himself's filmography
@GingerWildheart Fuck me! I want to hear THAT RIFF from 'Deterioration' live! #mutation
@DaftLimmy I'm in Cardiff and would definitely come to Bristol for it
@danthomascomedy Likewise. 30 odd pages in. It is dense but more readable than I was expecting
@ChrisPurchase @matthaig1 Certainly helped me
@markolver @phlaimeaux Is it a dugong show?
@dafyddg @sophia_salmassi That IS a dynamic list
@dafyddg I used to love Fruit Polos - my secondary school sweet of choice. Impressed that anyone got anywhere near that hashtag
@dafyddg ...because Polo mints are white...?
West Bromwich Albino #SwapALetterDepigmentAFootballClub
@danthomascomedy Me too, or the bath https://t.co/PYVN3bWjdK
@danthomascomedy I think adult undergarments may be needed to finish this book. Some of the paragraphs are 5 pages long.
@danthomascomedy There's a chapter break at page 95 called YEAR OF THE DEPEND ADULT UNDERGARMENT - I'll see you there
@elisjames I'm planning on doing Palace vs Sunderland on my own. I'll now be thinking of myself as adorable while I'm there.
@danthomascomedy I understand. I missed the whole 92/93 season because of Greg Bear.
@danthomascomedy I don't, but I like books. Just finished re-reading Murakami's 1Q84 so I reckon I can handle the strain.
@danthomascomedy Nice. I'll grab a copy in town tomorrow (hadn't even got that far) and we can go from there
@danthomascomedy I've been meaning to read that as well. Fancy doing a mini book club?
